description.raw:
Pending pull request #80

Depending on [osrf_msgs](#!/osrf/osrf-common/src/558ec11c2f5d9614a917718eacdcbfce1df2a8f6/ros/osrf_msgs?at=default) for ros messages.

Generate [atlas_msgs](#!/osrf/drcsim/src/88fb522480db700f80d4df5d509f21c0a434b5d6/ros/atlas_msgs/msg?at=rosify_plugins).

Moved ros plugins for atlas robot into [atlas_msgs](#!/osrf/drcsim/src/88fb522480db/ros/atlas_msgs?at=rosify_plugins).

Generate atlas model with xacro dynamically in [atlas_description](#!/osrf/drcsim/src/88fb522480db/ros/atlas_description?at=rosify_plugins)

Generate [irobot hand](#!/osrf/drcsim/src/88fb522480db/ros/irobot_hand_description?at=rosify_plugins) with xacro dynamically.

Generate [multisense_sl](#!/osrf/drcsim/src/88fb522480db/ros/multisense_sl_description?at=rosify_plugins) with xacro dynamically.
description.html:
Pending pull request #80

Depending on osrf_msgs for ros messages.

Generate atlas_msgs.

Generate atlas model with xacro dynamically in atlas_description

Generate irobot hand with xacro dynamically.

Generate multisense_sl with xacro dynamically.
